name: Critter Craze
description:
University Assignment for upgrading a prototype of a game. 

Critter Craze is a 2D platformer where you can play as a hero who travels through various locations dodging and fighting the different unique critter enemies while collecting all the hidden fruit to increase your score! 

Can you beat your friends and collect the most points? or can you beat your time getting through each level? 
Keep track of those traps and enemies, otherwise, you may be surprised.

Controls

  • WASD - Move around
  • Space - Jump
  • Mouse - To click start or next level.
  • Alt-F4 - if you wish to quit in a level.
